properties.name: cardPaymentApiBaseUrl
properties.description: The base URL for the card payment api

properties.name: apiKeyUn
properties.description: API key username found in the merchant back-office under settings

properties.name: apiKeyPswd
properties.description: API key password found in the merchant back-office under settings

properties.name: suTokenApiUn
properties.description: Single-Use token API username found in the merchant back-office under settings

properties.name: suTokenApiPswd
properties.description: Single-Use token API password found in the merchant back-office under settings

properties.name: accountId
properties.description: Account ID found in the merchant back-office under accounts

properties.name: useThreeDSecureVersion2
properties.description: Choose whether to use 3DS version 2, given 'useThreeDSecure' is set to true
